    return list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

def get_num1(i):
    cnt = 0
    while i:
        if i%2:
            cnt +=1
        i //=2
    return cnt

from array import array
def popcount(x):
    res = 0;
    while(x > 0):
        res += (x & 1)
        x >>= 1
    return res

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = array('i',[popcount(int(x)) for x in input().split(' ')])

    ans,s0,s1 = 0,0,0
    for i in range(n):
        if(a[i] & 1):
            s0,s1 = s1,s0 + 1
        else:
            s0,s1 = s0 + 1, s1
        ans += s0

    for i in range(n):
        mx,sum = a[i],0
        for j in range(i, min(n, i + 70)):
            mx = max(mx, a[j]<<1)
            sum += a[j]
            if( (sum & 1 is 0) and (mx > sum)):
                ans-=1
    print(ans)
